channel.title: Help please (i'm a noob)
channel.description: Hello, Im new here, and need some help. After i downloaded MoparScape i read the : Read me. They said: Please open runMoparScape after i clicked that there came a screen thats said: Press an key. When i pressed a key he wouldn't do anything... Please can someone help me? :(

item.title: Help please (i'm a noob)
item.dc:creator: @cowie cowie
item.description:
@cowie wrote:

hes tryna use mopar client not make server learn to read ? and get good answers to problems ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please (i'm a noob)
item.dc:creator: @monsha monsha
item.description:
@monsha wrote:

[quote=“Rubberduckies, post:1, topic:15486”]Hello,
Im new here, and need some help.
After i downloaded MoparScape i read the : Read me.
They said: Please open runMoparScape after i clicked that there came a screen thats said:
Press an key.
When i pressed a key he wouldn’t do anything…
Please can someone help me? :([/quote] I suggest getting the Testscape server_source. Its more explanatory, and easier to handle

Read full topic

item.title: Help please (i'm a noob)
item.dc:creator: @2_short_2die 2 short 2die
item.description:
@2_short_2die wrote:

update java and right click on run moparscape
and make it look like this
@echo off
title Running Bot
java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar;./HybridScape; Bot 0
::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem
pause

Read full topic
